resources.string: Sorry, there\'s no web browser available

How do I log in?
 
 By choosing your current Google account that available on your phone, no passwords needed. You can use multiple accounts and the game progress will be tracked for individual one. 
 
 Map will not show up:
 
 Make sure the internet connection is on. The user location also depends on internet connection.
 
 How do I get new Destination? 
 
 Press New Destination and then accept to remove the current location.
 
 How do I get the map?
 
 When a new target is chosen press View on Map or select Map in menu.
 
 Which type of direction can I get? 
 
 Walking and biking directions with corresponding distances and estimated travel times. The times and routes are updates every 30 second. 
 
 What is the goal of the game? 
 
 The challenge is to reach all the available destinations in your city. It is checked in two stages: first you take a picture of the pub name, the application recognizes the text and if it matches then you request location check. If the coordinates coincide to those of the target within the accuracy level you get points and the place is added to your profile. This way you can have a local competition with your friends.
 
 What city does it work in? 
 
 Just Gothenburg currently but pubs can be added to the database at any desired time and to any city.
